name: The Train Station
description:
You just got off the train after work. Time to go home. BUT it seems like the train station you are on has something wrong with it.

The Train Station is a horror game where you try to exit the train station.

This is my first game. Hope you will enjoy the game.

Please report any bugs and also provide criticism so I can improve.

Patch notes:

(28/7/22) -Fixed some lighting issues, there might still be some problems

                       - The torch is less bright

                       -Added ambience
